#summary Manual of PoPOOLation

= Requirements =

  * Perl 5.8 or higher
  * R 2.7 or higher
  * a short read aligner (e.g.: bwa)
  * samtools



= PoPOOLation scripts =

== General note ==

Help for all PoPOOLation scripts can be requested using the '--help' option. 
For example
{{{
perl trim-fastq.pl --help
}}}

Unit tests for all PoPOOLation scripts can be run using the '--test' option
For example:
{{{
perl trim-fastq.pl --test
}}}
